price: ߏ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒߠߋ ߦߴߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߗߋߘߋ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߣߵߌ ߛߐ߫ ߘߋ߲ߞߍ߫ ߛߊߣߌ߲ߡߊ߲߫ ߠߊ߫
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمٗا زَكِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā anā rasūlu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulāman zakiyyan
